spells.name: Delayed Consumption
spells.description: Extract doesn't come into effect until you want it to.

spells.name: Elude Time
spells.description: Puts you in temporary suspended animation.

spells.name: Planar Adaptation
spells.description: Resist harmful effects of one plane.

spells.name: Resurgent Transformation
spells.description: Gain second wind when close to death.
